summary: Changes the Ring of Hircine to avoid redundancy with other werewolf mods.
descriptionHtml:
*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*

Ring of Hircine Modified v. 1.0
by KingMudkip

*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*


Description
-----------
This is a very simple mod that changes the Ring of Hircine\'s effects to make it more compatible with some of the werewolf mods on Skyrim Nexus. A common feature I\'ve noticed is that many of the werewolf tweak mods (including LFox\'s highly popular one) make the Ring\'s Additional Werewolf Transformations effect redundant, so I decided to modify its enchantment to be more useful.

This mod was originally intended for use with LFox\'s werewolf mod, but it works independently and won\'t conflict with any other mod as long as they don\'t modify the  Ring.

Effects
-------
The Ring of Hircine now has the following effects:
+10 Unarmed Damage
-8% Fatigue Regen
The Cursed Ring is not modified in any way.

Installation/Uninstallation
------------
Idiot-proof. Just drag the .esp into your Data folder and enable. To uninstall, just delete it.

Notes
-----
In the future I want to find a way to make it work with Beast Form, and possibly tweak the enchantment some more to keep the Ring an artifact.
Also, this is my first successful mod, so any advice or feedback would be appreciated.

Change Log
----------
v 1.0: First release.
author: KingMudkip
